where ab.mno=#{mno} and ab.ab_inout=2 and ab.ab_date between last_day(now() - interval #{mm}+1 month) + interval 1 day and last_day(now() - interval #{mm} month)
select sum(ab.ab_amount) dtSum from account_book ab
select round(avg(ab.ab_amount), 0) dtSum from account_book ab

select date_format(ab.ab_date, '%Y-%m-%d') date, sum(ab.ab_amount) sum from account_book ab
group by date

select concat( date_format( date_add(ab.ab_date, interval (weekday(ab.ab_date)) * -1 day), '%Y-%m-%d' ), ' ~ ', date_format( date_add(ab.ab_date, interval (6 - weekday(ab.ab_date)) * +1 day), '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) as week2
from account_book ab inner join category ct on ct.ctno=ab.ctno

(select ct.ct_top from account_book ab inner join category ct on ab.ctno=ct.ctno
group by ct.ct_top order by sum(ab.ab_amount) desc limit 4 ) as tmp
mapper.select: select round(avg(ab.ab_amount), 0) * (datediff(last_day(now()), date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) ) expSum from account_book ab

select (select datediff(LAST_DAY(NOW()), last_day(now() - interval 1 month) + interval 1 day)+1) - (select count(c.date) as cnt from ( select date_format(ab.ab_date, '%Y-%m-%d') date from account_book ab
group by date) as c);
select t2.date t2date, (select sum(t1.sum) from () as t1 where t1.date<= t2.date) as cumSum from () as t2 order by t2date;

select ct.ct_top top1, ct.ct_bottom bottom1, ab.ab_amount amt, ab_content content
order by amt desc limit 4;
